DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: ' Civil War ' Producer Criticizes Disney : Ken Burns , producer of the acclaimed public television series , said building a theme park near a historic battlefield in Virginia could destroy a place " where the ghosts of our collective past still have the power to mesmerize. " Burns said he was joining other historians in urging Walt Disney Co . to build elsewhere even though he too is in the business of popularizing history " and , in fact . . . ( am ) working with Disney on another unrelated history project. " Burns is under contract as a consultant on a documentary about baseball . He issued his statement through Protect Historic America , a group of writers and historians that last week asked Disney not to build the park on the proposed site near the Civil War battlefield at Manassas , Va. , near Washington .
